name: HyperBee
description:
HyperBee is a micro Moba with the goal to collect pollen and fill your hive before the opposing team!

Controls are simple,  AWSD to move around or you can use your Arrow keys or both!

 if something breaks just push ESC to restart the game!

Your goal is to keep moving and to collect the pollen. Once your Pollen bar is full you can then fly home to drop it off! You must be always s moving in order to collect and drop off pollen! it won't come off its self!

Watch out for crashing into other bees! while no bee will directly attack you, be careful not to crash!

race around flower to flower to fill your hive before your opponent!
